Introduction

Gihyeon is a South Korean singer under Nouer Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group NouerA and was previously part of the pre-debut boy group Daily Note, which is now called ALL(H)OURS.

He is best known for being a contestant on the reality survival show MAKE MATE 1.
